titles.title: To amend subchapter II of chapter 73 of title 10, United States Code, to prevent cost-of-living increases in the survivor annuity contributions of uniformed services retirees from becoming effective before related cost-of-living increases in retired pay become payable.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on National Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 7/24/1995--Introduced. Prevents cost-of-living increases in the survivor annuity contributions of uniformed services retirees from becoming effective before cost-of-living increases in retired pay become payable.
